TEXT.TITLE: BDS MEDICAL <BSDM> RECEIVES PATENT
TEXT.BODY: BSD Medical Corp said it received a patent from the U.S. Patent Office for its invasive/external electric field sensors. The company said the patent is its fourth in seven months. Reuter
